name: Michael Hobson
text: The quality and service of the hungry howies in Mogadore has been second to none. I order very often, and mistakes have been made on very few occasions but brandy and mike always go over the top to make sure my experiences were nothing less than exceptional. The food and incredibly personable service will keep me coming back!

text: I just bought the steak and cheese sub along with a large mushroom pizza. It was the worst food that I have ever had! Did you change your recipe? The pizza was little more than cardboard with no flavor! The sub was bland! I will never eat from here again! What a disaster!
